trans-unit.source: An <xref href="System.Windows.Media.ImageSource"></xref> that displays a user-created Direct3D surface.
trans-unit.target: Um <xref href="System.Windows.Media.ImageSource"> </xref> que exibe uma superfície de Direct3D criado pelo usuário.

trans-unit.source: Use the D3DImage class to host Direct3D content in a Windows Presentation Foundation (WPF) application.
trans-unit.target: Use a classe D3DImage para hospedar conteúdo Direct3D em um aplicativo do Windows Presentation Foundation (WPF).

trans-unit.source: Call the <xref:System.Windows.Interop.D3DImage.Lock%2A> method to change the Direct3D content displayed by the D3DImage.
trans-unit.target: Chamar o <xref:System.Windows.Interop.D3DImage.Lock%2A>método para alterar o conteúdo de Direct3D exibido pelo D3DImage.</xref:System.Windows.Interop.D3DImage.Lock%2A>

trans-unit.source: Call the <xref:System.Windows.Interop.D3DImage.SetBackBuffer%2A> method to assign a Direct3D surface to a D3DImage.
trans-unit.target: Chamar o <xref:System.Windows.Interop.D3DImage.SetBackBuffer%2A>método para atribuir uma superfície Direct3D para um D3DImage.</xref:System.Windows.Interop.D3DImage.SetBackBuffer%2A>

trans-unit.source: Call the <xref:System.Windows.Interop.D3DImage.AddDirtyRect%2A> method to track updates to the Direct3D surface.
trans-unit.target: Chamar o <xref:System.Windows.Interop.D3DImage.AddDirtyRect%2A>método para controlar as atualizações para a superfície do Direct3D.</xref:System.Windows.Interop.D3DImage.AddDirtyRect%2A>

trans-unit.source: Call the <xref:System.Windows.Interop.D3DImage.Unlock%2A> method to display the changed areas.
trans-unit.target: Chamar o <xref:System.Windows.Interop.D3DImage.Unlock%2A>método para exibir as áreas alteradas.</xref:System.Windows.Interop.D3DImage.Unlock%2A>

trans-unit.source: The D3DImage class manages two display buffers, which are called the *back buffer* and the *front buffer*.
trans-unit.target: A classe D3DImage gerencia dois buffers de exibição, que são chamados de *buffer de fundo* e *buffer frontal*.

trans-unit.source: The back buffer is your Direct3D surface.
trans-unit.target: O buffer de fundo é a superfície do Direct3D.

trans-unit.source: Changes to the back buffer are copied forward to the front buffer when you call the <xref:System.Windows.Interop.D3DImage.Unlock%2A> method, where it is displayed on the hardware.
trans-unit.target: Alterações para o buffer de fundo são copiadas para frente no buffer frontal ao chamar o <xref:System.Windows.Interop.D3DImage.Unlock%2A>método, onde ele é exibido no hardware.</xref:System.Windows.Interop.D3DImage.Unlock%2A>

trans-unit.source: Occasionally, the front buffer becomes unavailable.
trans-unit.target: Ocasionalmente, o buffer frontal ficará indisponível.

trans-unit.source: This lack of availability can be caused by screen locking, full-screen exclusive Direct3D applications, user-switching, or other system activities.
trans-unit.target: Esta falta de disponibilidade pode ser causada pelo bloqueio de tela, aplicativos Direct3D exclusivos de tela inteira, troca de usuário ou outras atividades do sistema.

trans-unit.source: When this occurs, your WPF application is notified by handling the <xref:System.Windows.Interop.D3DImage.IsFrontBufferAvailableChanged> event.
trans-unit.target: Quando isso ocorrer, o aplicativo do WPF é notificado manipulando o <xref:System.Windows.Interop.D3DImage.IsFrontBufferAvailableChanged>evento.</xref:System.Windows.Interop.D3DImage.IsFrontBufferAvailableChanged>

trans-unit.source: How your application responds to the front buffer becoming unavailable depends on whether WPF is enabled to fall back to software rendering.
trans-unit.target: Como seu aplicativo responde ao buffer frontal fique indisponível depende se o WPF está habilitado para voltar a renderização por software.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Interop.D3DImage.SetBackBuffer%2A> method has an overload that takes a parameter that specifies whether WPF falls back to software rendering.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Windows.Interop.D3DImage.SetBackBuffer%2A>método tem uma sobrecarga que usa um parâmetro que especifica se WPF voltará para renderização por software.</xref:System.Windows.Interop.D3DImage.SetBackBuffer%2A>

trans-unit.source: Responding to an Unavailable Front Buffer when WPF Does not Fall Back to Software Rendering When you call the <xref:System.Windows.Interop.D3DImage.SetBackBuffer%28System.Windows.Interop.D3DResourceType%2CSystem.IntPtr%29> overload or call the <xref:System.Windows.Interop.D3DImage.SetBackBuffer%28System.Windows.Interop.D3DResourceType%2CSystem.IntPtr%2CSystem.Boolean%29> overload with the `enableSoftwareFallback` parameter set to `false`, the rendering system releases its reference to the back buffer when the front buffer becomes unavailable and nothing is displayed.
trans-unit.target: Responder a um Buffer frontal indisponível quando WPF não será revertido para a renderização de Software ao chamar o <xref:System.Windows.Interop.D3DImage.SetBackBuffer%28System.Windows.Interop.D3DResourceType%2CSystem.IntPtr%29>sobrecarregar ou chamar o <xref:System.Windows.Interop.D3DImage.SetBackBuffer%28System.Windows.Interop.D3DResourceType%2CSystem.IntPtr%2CSystem.Boolean%29>sobrecarga com a `enableSoftwareFallback` parâmetro definido como `false`, o sistema de processamento libera sua referência para o buffer de fundo quando o buffer principal fica indisponível, e nada é exibido.</xref:System.Windows.Interop.D3DImage.SetBackBuffer%28System.Windows.Interop.D3DResourceType%2CSystem.IntPtr%2CSystem.Boolean%29> </xref:System.Windows.Interop.D3DImage.SetBackBuffer%28System.Windows.Interop.D3DResourceType%2CSystem.IntPtr%29>

trans-unit.source: When the front buffer is available again, the rendering system raises the <xref:System.Windows.Interop.D3DImage.IsFrontBufferAvailableChanged> event to notify your WPF application.
trans-unit.target: Quando o buffer frontal está disponível novamente, o sistema de processamento gera o <xref:System.Windows.Interop.D3DImage.IsFrontBufferAvailableChanged>evento para notificar o aplicativo do WPF.</xref:System.Windows.Interop.D3DImage.IsFrontBufferAvailableChanged>

trans-unit.source: You can create an event handler for the <xref:System.Windows.Interop.D3DImage.IsFrontBufferAvailableChanged> event to restart rendering again with a valid Direct3D surface.
trans-unit.target: Você pode criar um manipulador de eventos para o <xref:System.Windows.Interop.D3DImage.IsFrontBufferAvailableChanged>eventos reiniciar renderização novamente com uma superfície Direct3D válida.</xref:System.Windows.Interop.D3DImage.IsFrontBufferAvailableChanged>

trans-unit.source: To restart rendering, you must call <xref:System.Windows.Interop.D3DImage.SetBackBuffer%2A>.
trans-unit.target: Para reiniciar o processamento, você deve chamar <xref:System.Windows.Interop.D3DImage.SetBackBuffer%2A>.</xref:System.Windows.Interop.D3DImage.SetBackBuffer%2A>

trans-unit.source: Responding to an Unavailable Front Buffer when WPF Falls Back to Software Rendering When you call the <xref:System.Windows.Interop.D3DImage.SetBackBuffer%28System.Windows.Interop.D3DResourceType%2CSystem.IntPtr%2CSystem.Boolean%29> overload with the `enableSoftwareFallback` parameter set to `true`, the rendering system retains its reference to the back buffer when the front buffer becomes unavailable, so there is no need to call <xref:System.Windows.Interop.D3DImage.SetBackBuffer%2A> when the front buffer is available again.
trans-unit.target: Respondendo a um Buffer frontal indisponível quando WPF cai voltar para renderização de Software quando você chama o <xref:System.Windows.Interop.D3DImage.SetBackBuffer%28System.Windows.Interop.D3DResourceType%2CSystem.IntPtr%2CSystem.Boolean%29>sobrecarga com a `enableSoftwareFallback` parâmetro definido como `true`, o sistema de processamento retém sua referência para o buffer de fundo quando o buffer principal fica indisponível, portanto, não há necessidade de chamar <xref:System.Windows.Interop.D3DImage.SetBackBuffer%2A>quando o buffer frontal está disponível novamente.</xref:System.Windows.Interop.D3DImage.SetBackBuffer%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Interop.D3DImage.SetBackBuffer%28System.Windows.Interop.D3DResourceType%2CSystem.IntPtr%2CSystem.Boolean%29>

trans-unit.source: There may be situations where the user’s device becomes unavailable.
trans-unit.target: Pode haver situações em que o dispositivo do usuário se torna indisponível.

trans-unit.source: When that occurs, call <xref:System.Windows.Interop.D3DImage.SetBackBuffer%2A> to release WPF’s reference to the back buffer.
trans-unit.target: Quando isso ocorrer, chame <xref:System.Windows.Interop.D3DImage.SetBackBuffer%2A>para liberar a referência do WPF para o buffer de fundo.</xref:System.Windows.Interop.D3DImage.SetBackBuffer%2A>

trans-unit.source: If you need to reset your device, call <xref:System.Windows.Interop.D3DImage.SetBackBuffer%2A> with the `backBuffer` parameter set to `null`, and then call <xref:System.Windows.Interop.D3DImage.SetBackBuffer%2A> again with `backBuffer` set to a valid Direct3D surface.
trans-unit.target: Se você precisar redefinir o dispositivo, chame <xref:System.Windows.Interop.D3DImage.SetBackBuffer%2A>com o `backBuffer` parâmetro definido como `null`e, em seguida, chame <xref:System.Windows.Interop.D3DImage.SetBackBuffer%2A>novamente com `backBuffer` definido como uma superfície Direct3D válida.</xref:System.Windows.Interop.D3DImage.SetBackBuffer%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Interop.D3DImage.SetBackBuffer%2A>

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > Performance depends greatly on the settings of the Direct3D surface.
trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE] > Desempenho depende muito das configurações da superfície Direct3D.

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [Performance Considerations for Direct3D9 and WPF Interoperability](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: Para obter mais informações, consulte [considerações sobre desempenho de Direct3D9 e interoperabilidade do WPF](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > The D3DImage class does not display Direct3D content when WPF renders in software, such as over a Remote Desktop connection, unless you call <xref:System.Windows.Interop.D3DImage.SetBackBuffer%28System.Windows.Interop.D3DResourceType%2CSystem.IntPtr%2CSystem.Boolean%29> and specify `true` for the `enableSoftwareFallback` parameter.
trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE] > D3DImage a classe não exibe conteúdo Direct3D ao WPF é renderizado no software, como em uma conexão de área de trabalho remota, a menos que você chame <xref:System.Windows.Interop.D3DImage.SetBackBuffer%28System.Windows.Interop.D3DResourceType%2CSystem.IntPtr%2CSystem.Boolean%29>e especifique `true` para o `enableSoftwareFallback` parâmetro.</xref:System.Windows.Interop.D3DImage.SetBackBuffer%28System.Windows.Interop.D3DResourceType%2CSystem.IntPtr%2CSystem.Boolean%29>

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Windows.Interop.D3DImage"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: Inicializa uma nova instância do <xref href="System.Windows.Interop.D3DImage"> </xref> classe.

trans-unit.source: The default display resolution is 1/96th inch.
trans-unit.target: A resolução de vídeo padrão é 1/96 polegada.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Windows.Interop.D3DImage"></xref> class with the specified display resolution.
trans-unit.target: Inicializa uma nova instância do <xref href="System.Windows.Interop.D3DImage"> </xref> classe com a resolução de exibição especificado.

trans-unit.source: The default display resolution is 1/96th inch.
trans-unit.target: A resolução de vídeo padrão é 1/96 polegada.

trans-unit.source: The display resolution on the x-axis.
trans-unit.target: A resolução de vídeo no eixo x.

trans-unit.source: The display resolution on the y-axis.
trans-unit.target: A resolução de vídeo no eixo y.

trans-unit.source: dpiX or dpiY is less than zero.
trans-unit.target: dpiXou dpiY é menor que zero.

trans-unit.source: Specifies the area of the back buffer that changed.
trans-unit.target: Especifica a área de buffer de fundo que foram alteradas.

trans-unit.source: Call the AddDirtyRect method to indicate changes your code has made to the back buffer.
trans-unit.target: Chame o método AddDirtyRect para indicar as alterações que seu código tenha feito para o buffer de fundo.

trans-unit.source: To be rendered, the changed area on the back buffer must have a corresponding changed area on the <xref:System.Windows.Interop.D3DImage>.
trans-unit.target: Para ser processado, a área alterada no buffer de fundo deve ter uma área correspondente alterada em <xref:System.Windows.Interop.D3DImage>.</xref:System.Windows.Interop.D3DImage>

trans-unit.source: Call the <xref:System.Windows.Interop.D3DImage.SetBackBuffer%2A> and <xref:System.Windows.Interop.D3DImage.Lock%2A> methods before calling the AddDirtyRect method.
trans-unit.target: Chamar o <xref:System.Windows.Interop.D3DImage.SetBackBuffer%2A>e <xref:System.Windows.Interop.D3DImage.Lock%2A>métodos antes de chamar o método AddDirtyRect.</xref:System.Windows.Interop.D3DImage.Lock%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Interop.D3DImage.SetBackBuffer%2A>

trans-unit.source: Call the <xref:System.Windows.Interop.D3DImage.Unlock%2A> method to copy the changed areas to the front buffer.
trans-unit.target: Chamar o <xref:System.Windows.Interop.D3DImage.Unlock%2A>método para copiar as áreas alteradas no buffer frontal.</xref:System.Windows.Interop.D3DImage.Unlock%2A>

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > After a few calls to the AddDirtyRect method, the changed areas are merged into a single area.
trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE] > Após algumas chamadas para o método AddDirtyRect, as áreas alteradas são mescladas em uma única área.

trans-unit.source: This means you must have valid data outside of the changed areas.
trans-unit.target: Isso significa que você deve ter dados válidos fora de áreas alteradas.

trans-unit.source: An <xref href="System.Windows.Int32Rect"></xref> that represents the area that changed.
trans-unit.target: Um <xref href="System.Windows.Int32Rect"> </xref> que representa a área que foram alteradas.

trans-unit.source: The bitmap has not been locked by a call to the <xref:System.Windows.Interop.D3DImage.Lock*> or <xref:System.Windows.Interop.D3DImage.TryLock*> methods.
trans-unit.target: O bitmap não foi bloqueado por uma chamada para o <> </> *> ou <> </> *> métodos.

trans-unit.source: -or- The back buffer has not been assigned by a call to the <xref:System.Windows.Interop.D3DImage.SetBackBuffer*> method.
trans-unit.target: - ou - o buffer de fundo não foi atribuído por uma chamada para o <xref:System.Windows.Interop.D3DImage.SetBackBuffer*>método.</xref:System.Windows.Interop.D3DImage.SetBackBuffer*>

trans-unit.source: One or more of the following conditions is true.
trans-unit.target: Um ou mais das seguintes condições é verdadeira.

trans-unit.source: dirtyRect.X < 0 dirtyRect.Y < 0 dirtyRect.Width < 0 or dirtyRect.Width > dirtyRect.Height < 0 or dirtyRect.Height >
trans-unit.target: dirtyRect.X< 0 dirtyRect.Y < 0 dirtyRect.Width < 0 or dirtyRect.Width > <>*> dirtyRect.Height < 0 or dirtyRect.Height ><>*>

trans-unit.source: Creates a modifiable clone of this <xref href="System.Windows.Interop.D3DImage"></xref> object, making deep copies of this object's values.
trans-unit.target: Cria um clone modificável <xref href="System.Windows.Interop.D3DImage"> </xref> objeto, fazendo cópias profundas dos valores do objeto.

trans-unit.source: When copying dependency properties, this method copies resource references and data bindings (which may no longer resolve), but not animations or their current values.
trans-unit.target: Ao copiar as propriedades de dependência, esse método copia dados e referências de ligações de recurso (que não podem resolver), mas não animações ou seus valores atuais.

trans-unit.source: This method is used to produce modifiable copies of frozen <xref:System.Windows.Freezable> objects (or any <xref:System.Windows.Freezable> object).
trans-unit.target: Esse método é usado para produzir cópias modificáveis de congelada <xref:System.Windows.Freezable>objetos (ou qualquer <xref:System.Windows.Freezable>objeto).</xref:System.Windows.Freezable> </xref:System.Windows.Freezable>

trans-unit.source: For convenience, this method shadows the inherited version with a strongly typed implementation.
trans-unit.target: Para sua conveniência, este método sombreia a versão herdada com uma implementação fortemente tipada.

trans-unit.source: For more information, see <xref:System.Windows.Freezable.Clone%2A?displayProperty=fullName>.
trans-unit.target: Para obter mais informações, consulte <xref:System.Windows.Freezable.Clone%2A?displayProperty=fullName>.</xref:System.Windows.Freezable.Clone%2A?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: A modifiable clone of the current object.
trans-unit.target: Um clone modificável do objeto atual.

trans-unit.source: The cloned object's <xref:System.Windows.Freezable.IsFrozen*> property will be <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref> even if the source's <xref:System.Windows.Freezable.IsFrozen*> property was <xref uid="langword_csharp_true." name="true." href=""></xref>
trans-unit.target: O objeto clonado <> </> *> propriedade será <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref> mesmo se a fonte <> </> *> era de propriedade<xref uid="langword_csharp_true." name="true." href=""></xref>

trans-unit.source: Makes the instance a clone (deep copy) of the specified <xref href="System.Windows.Freezable"></xref> using base (non-animated) property values.
trans-unit.target: Faz a instância de um clone (cópia em profundidade) especificada <xref href="System.Windows.Freezable"> </xref> usando valores de propriedade base (não animado).

trans-unit.source: The object to clone.
trans-unit.target: O objeto para clonar.

trans-unit.source: Creates a modifiable clone of this <xref href="System.Windows.Interop.D3DImage"></xref> object, making deep copies of this object's current values.
trans-unit.target: Cria um clone modificável <xref href="System.Windows.Interop.D3DImage"> </xref> objeto, fazendo cópias profundas dos valores atuais deste objeto.

trans-unit.source: Resource references, data bindings, and animations are not copied, but their current values are copied.
trans-unit.target: Referências de recurso, associações de dados e animações não são copiadas, mas seus valores atuais serão copiados.

trans-unit.source: This method is used to produce modifiable copies of frozen <xref:System.Windows.Freezable> objects (or any <xref:System.Windows.Freezable> object).
trans-unit.target: Esse método é usado para produzir cópias modificáveis de congelada <xref:System.Windows.Freezable>objetos (ou qualquer <xref:System.Windows.Freezable>objeto).</xref:System.Windows.Freezable> </xref:System.Windows.Freezable>

trans-unit.source: For convenience, this method shadows the inherited version with a strongly typed implementation.
trans-unit.target: Para sua conveniência, este método sombreia a versão herdada com uma implementação fortemente tipada.

trans-unit.source: For more information, see <xref:System.Windows.Freezable.CloneCurrentValue%2A?displayProperty=fullName>.
trans-unit.target: Para obter mais informações, consulte <xref:System.Windows.Freezable.CloneCurrentValue%2A?displayProperty=fullName>.</xref:System.Windows.Freezable.CloneCurrentValue%2A?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: A modifiable clone of the current object.
trans-unit.target: Um clone modificável do objeto atual.

trans-unit.source: The cloned object's <xref:System.Windows.Freezable.IsFrozen*> property will be <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref> even if the source's <xref:System.Windows.Freezable.IsFrozen*> property was <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: O objeto clonado <> </> *> propriedade será <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref> mesmo se a fonte <> </> *> propriedade <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Makes the instance a modifiable clone (deep copy) of the specified <xref href="System.Windows.Freezable"></xref> using current property values.
trans-unit.target: Faz a instância de um clone modificável (cópia em profundidade) especificado <xref href="System.Windows.Freezable"> </xref> usando os valores da propriedade atual.

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Windows.Freezable"></xref> to be cloned.
trans-unit.target: O <xref href="System.Windows.Freezable"> </xref> a ser clonado.

trans-unit.source: Creates a software copy of the <xref href="System.Windows.Interop.D3DImage"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Cria uma cópia do software do <xref href="System.Windows.Interop.D3DImage"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: The CopyBackBuffer method is called by clients such as the printing system and the <xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.RenderTargetBitmap> class.
trans-unit.target: O método CopyBackBuffer é chamado por clientes como o sistema de impressão e a <xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.RenderTargetBitmap>classe.</xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.RenderTargetBitmap>

trans-unit.source: Optionally override the CopyBackBuffer method to implement custom logic and return a different <xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapSource>.
trans-unit.target: Opcionalmente, substitua o método CopyBackBuffer para implementar uma lógica personalizada e retornar <xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapSource>.</xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapSource> diferentes

trans-unit.source: For example, you can return a placeholder <xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapSource> if the default CopyBackBuffer implementation returns `null`.
trans-unit.target: Por exemplo, você pode retornar um espaço reservado <xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapSource>se retorna a implementação do padrão CopyBackBuffer `null`.</xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapSource>

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapSource"></xref> that is a software copy of the current state of the back buffer; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref> if the back buffer cannot be read.
trans-unit.target: Um <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapSource"> </xref> que é uma cópia do software do atual estado do buffer de fundo; caso contrário, <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""> </xref> se o buffer de fundo não pode ser lido.

trans-unit.source: When implemented in a derived class, creates a new instance of the <xref href="System.Windows.Interop.D3DImage"></xref> derived class.
trans-unit.target: Quando implementada em uma classe derivada, cria uma nova instância do <xref href="System.Windows.Interop.D3DImage"> </xref> classe derivada.

trans-unit.source: If you derive from the <xref:System.Windows.Interop.D3DImage> class, you must override the CreateInstanceCore method to enable correct cloning.
trans-unit.target: Se você derivar do <xref:System.Windows.Interop.D3DImage>classe, você deve substituir o método CreateInstanceCore para habilitar a clonagem correto.</xref:System.Windows.Interop.D3DImage>

trans-unit.source: The default implementation performs a `return new D3DImage()`, which will not be correct if the instance is a different class.
trans-unit.target: A implementação padrão executa um `return new D3DImage()`, que não esteja correto, se a instância é uma classe diferente.

trans-unit.source: The new instance.
trans-unit.target: A nova instância.

trans-unit.source: Frees resources and performs other cleanup operations before the <xref href="System.Windows.Interop.D3DImage"></xref> is reclaimed by garbage collection.
trans-unit.target: Libera recursos e executa outras operações de limpeza antes do <xref href="System.Windows.Interop.D3DImage"> </xref> é recuperada pela coleta de lixo.

trans-unit.source: This method overrides <xref:System.Object.Finalize%2A>.
trans-unit.target: Esse método substitui <xref:System.Object.Finalize%2A>.</xref:System.Object.Finalize%2A>

trans-unit.source: Application code should not call this method; an object's `Finalize` method is automatically invoked during garbage collection, unless finalization by the garbage collector has been disabled by a call to the <xref:System.GC.SuppressFinalize%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: Código do aplicativo não deve chamar esse método; um objeto `Finalize` método é invocado automaticamente durante a coleta de lixo, a menos que a finalização pelo coletor de lixo foi desabilitada por uma chamada para o <xref:System.GC.SuppressFinalize%2A>método.</xref:System.GC.SuppressFinalize%2A>

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [Finalize Methods and Destructors](http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/fd376774-1643-499b-869e-9546a3aeea70), [Cleaning Up Unmanaged Resources](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md), and [Overriding the Finalize Method](http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/8026cb68-fe93-43fc-96c1-c09ad7d64cd3).
trans-unit.target: Para obter mais informações, consulte [métodos Finalize e destruidores](http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/fd376774-1643-499b-869e-9546a3aeea70), [limpeza de recursos não gerenciados](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md), e [substituindo o método Finalize](http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/8026cb68-fe93-43fc-96c1-c09ad7d64cd3).

trans-unit.source: Makes the <xref href="System.Windows.Interop.D3DImage"></xref> unmodifiable or determines whether it can be made unmodifiable.
trans-unit.target: Torna o <xref href="System.Windows.Interop.D3DImage"> </xref> não modificável ou determina se ele pode ser feito não modificável.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Interop.D3DImage> class does not allow freezing because changes are always possible due to front buffer availability.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Windows.Interop.D3DImage>classe não permite congelamento porque as alterações são sempre possíveis devido à disponibilidade de buffer frontal.</xref:System.Windows.Interop.D3DImage>

trans-unit.source: Has no effect.
trans-unit.target: Não tem nenhum efeito.

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref> in all cases.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>em todos os casos.

trans-unit.source: Makes the instance a frozen clone of the specified <xref href="System.Windows.Freezable"></xref> using base (non-animated) property values.
trans-unit.target: Faz a instância de um clone congelado especificada <xref href="System.Windows.Freezable"> </xref> usando valores de propriedade base (não animado).

trans-unit.source: The instance to copy.
trans-unit.target: A instância para copiar.

trans-unit.source: Makes the current instance a frozen clone of the specified <xref href="System.Windows.Freezable"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Faz a instância atual um clone congelado especificada <xref href="System.Windows.Freezable"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: If the object has animated dependency properties, their current animated values are copied.
trans-unit.target: Se o objeto tem propriedades de dependência animada, seus valores atuais de animado serão copiados.

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Windows.Freezable"></xref> to copy and freeze.
trans-unit.target: O <xref href="System.Windows.Freezable"> </xref> para copiar e congelar.

trans-unit.source: Gets the height of the <xref href="System.Windows.Interop.D3DImage"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Obtém a altura do <xref href="System.Windows.Interop.D3DImage"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: The value of Height can change when a new back buffer is assigned by a call to the <xref:System.Windows.Interop.D3DImage.SetBackBuffer%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: O valor da altura pode mudar quando um novo buffer de fundo é atribuído por uma chamada para o <xref:System.Windows.Interop.D3DImage.SetBackBuffer%2A>método.</xref:System.Windows.Interop.D3DImage.SetBackBuffer%2A>

trans-unit.source: The height of the <xref href="System.Windows.Interop.D3DImage"></xref>, in measure units.
trans-unit.target: A altura do <xref href="System.Windows.Interop.D3DImage"> </xref>, em unidades de medida.

trans-unit.source: A measure unit is 1/96th inch.
trans-unit.target: Uma unidade de medida é 1/96 polegada.

trans-unit.source: Gets a value that indicates whether a front buffer exists.
trans-unit.target: Obtém um valor que indica se existe um buffer frontal.

trans-unit.source: Occasionally, the front buffer becomes unavailable.
trans-unit.target: Ocasionalmente, o buffer frontal ficará indisponível.

trans-unit.source: This lack of availability can be caused by screen locking, full-screen exclusive Direct3D applications, user-switching, or other system activities.
trans-unit.target: Esta falta de disponibilidade pode ser causada pelo bloqueio de tela, aplicativos Direct3D exclusivos de tela inteira, troca de usuário ou outras atividades do sistema.

trans-unit.source: When this occurs, your WPF application is notified by handling the <xref:System.Windows.Interop.D3DImage.IsFrontBufferAvailableChanged> event.
trans-unit.target: Quando isso ocorrer, o aplicativo do WPF é notificado manipulando o <xref:System.Windows.Interop.D3DImage.IsFrontBufferAvailableChanged>evento.</xref:System.Windows.Interop.D3DImage.IsFrontBufferAvailableChanged>

trans-unit.source: How your application responds to the front buffer becoming unavailable depends on whether WPF is enabled to fall back to software rendering.
trans-unit.target: Como seu aplicativo responde ao buffer frontal fique indisponível depende se o WPF está habilitado para voltar a renderização por software.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Interop.D3DImage.SetBackBuffer%2A> method has an overload that takes a parameter that specifies whether WPF falls back to software rendering.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Windows.Interop.D3DImage.SetBackBuffer%2A>método tem uma sobrecarga que usa um parâmetro que especifica se WPF voltará para renderização por software.</xref:System.Windows.Interop.D3DImage.SetBackBuffer%2A>

trans-unit.source: For more information, see the remarks in the <xref:System.Windows.Interop.D3DImage> class.
trans-unit.target: Para obter mais informações, consulte os comentários na <xref:System.Windows.Interop.D3DImage>classe.</xref:System.Windows.Interop.D3DImage>

trans-unit.source: ## Dependency Property Information ||| |-|-| |Identifier field|| |Metadata properties set to `true`|None|
trans-unit.target: # # Informações de propriedade de dependência | | | |-|-| | Campo de identificador | | | Definir propriedades de metadados `true`| Nenhum |

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if a front buffer exists; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Se existir um buffer frontal. Caso contrário, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Occurs when the <xref:System.Windows.Interop.D3DImage.IsFrontBufferAvailable*> property changes.
trans-unit.target: Ocorre quando o <xref:System.Windows.Interop.D3DImage.IsFrontBufferAvailable*>alterações de propriedade.</xref:System.Windows.Interop.D3DImage.IsFrontBufferAvailable*>

trans-unit.source: Handle the IsFrontBufferAvailableChanged to be notified when the status of the front buffer changes.
trans-unit.target: Tratar IsFrontBufferAvailableChanged para ser notificado quando muda o status de buffer frontal.

trans-unit.source: How your application responds to the front buffer becoming unavailable depends on whether WPF is enabled to fall back to software rendering.
trans-unit.target: Como seu aplicativo responde ao buffer frontal fique indisponível depende se o WPF está habilitado para voltar a renderização por software.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Interop.D3DImage.SetBackBuffer%2A> method has an overload that takes a parameter that specifies whether WPF falls back to software rendering.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Windows.Interop.D3DImage.SetBackBuffer%2A>método tem uma sobrecarga que usa um parâmetro que especifica se WPF voltará para renderização por software.</xref:System.Windows.Interop.D3DImage.SetBackBuffer%2A>

trans-unit.source: For more information, see the remarks in the <xref:System.Windows.Interop.D3DImage> class.
trans-unit.target: Para obter mais informações, consulte os comentários na <xref:System.Windows.Interop.D3DImage>classe.</xref:System.Windows.Interop.D3DImage>

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: A ser adicionado.

trans-unit.source: Identifies the <xref:System.Windows.Interop.D3DImage.IsFrontBufferAvailable*> dependency property.
trans-unit.target: Identifica o <xref:System.Windows.Interop.D3DImage.IsFrontBufferAvailable*>DependencyProperty.</xref:System.Windows.Interop.D3DImage.IsFrontBufferAvailable*>

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: A ser adicionado.

trans-unit.source: Locks the <xref href="System.Windows.Interop.D3DImage"></xref> and enables operations on the back buffer.
trans-unit.target: Bloqueia o <xref href="System.Windows.Interop.D3DImage"> </xref> e permite operações no buffer de fundo.

trans-unit.source: Call the Lock method to change the back buffer by calling the <xref:System.Windows.Interop.D3DImage.AddDirtyRect%2A> and <xref:System.Windows.Interop.D3DImage.SetBackBuffer%2A> methods.
trans-unit.target: Chame o método de bloqueio para alterar o buffer de fundo chamando o <xref:System.Windows.Interop.D3DImage.AddDirtyRect%2A>e <xref:System.Windows.Interop.D3DImage.SetBackBuffer%2A>métodos.</xref:System.Windows.Interop.D3DImage.SetBackBuffer%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Interop.D3DImage.AddDirtyRect%2A>

trans-unit.source: While the <xref:System.Windows.Interop.D3DImage> is locked, your application can also render to the Direct3D surface assigned to the back buffer.
trans-unit.target: Enquanto o <xref:System.Windows.Interop.D3DImage>é bloqueado, seu aplicativo também pode processar para a superfície de Direct3D atribuída para o buffer de fundo.</xref:System.Windows.Interop.D3DImage>

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > The Lock method blocks when the rendering system is reading the back buffer to update the front buffer.
trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE] > Método Lock o bloqueia quando o sistema de processamento está lendo o buffer de fundo para atualizar o buffer frontal.

trans-unit.source: Use the <xref:System.Windows.Interop.D3DImage.TryLock%2A> method to avoid blocking indefinitely.
trans-unit.target: Use o <xref:System.Windows.Interop.D3DImage.TryLock%2A>método para evitar bloqueio indefinidamente.</xref:System.Windows.Interop.D3DImage.TryLock%2A>

trans-unit.source: The lock count equals <xref:System.UInt32.MaxValue>.
trans-unit.target: A contagem de bloqueio é igual a <xref:System.UInt32.MaxValue>.</xref:System.UInt32.MaxValue>

trans-unit.source: Gets the metadata associated with the image source.
trans-unit.target: Obtém os metadados associados com a origem da imagem.

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref> in all cases.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref>em todos os casos.

trans-unit.source: Gets the height of the <xref href="System.Windows.Interop.D3DImage"></xref>, in pixels.
trans-unit.target: Obtém a altura do <xref href="System.Windows.Interop.D3DImage"> </xref>, em pixels.

trans-unit.source: The value of PixelHeight can change when a new back buffer is assigned by a call to the <xref:System.Windows.Interop.D3DImage.SetBackBuffer%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: O valor de PixelHeight pode mudar quando um novo buffer de fundo é atribuído por uma chamada para o <xref:System.Windows.Interop.D3DImage.SetBackBuffer%2A>método.</xref:System.Windows.Interop.D3DImage.SetBackBuffer%2A>

trans-unit.source: The height of the <xref href="System.Windows.Interop.D3DImage"></xref>, in pixels.
trans-unit.target: A altura do <xref href="System.Windows.Interop.D3DImage"> </xref>, em pixels.

trans-unit.source: Gets the width of the <xref href="System.Windows.Interop.D3DImage"></xref>, in pixels.
trans-unit.target: Obtém a largura do <xref href="System.Windows.Interop.D3DImage"> </xref>, em pixels.

trans-unit.source: The value of PixelWidth can change when a new back buffer is assigned by a call to the <xref:System.Windows.Interop.D3DImage.SetBackBuffer%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: O valor de PixelWidth pode mudar quando um novo buffer de fundo é atribuído por uma chamada para o <xref:System.Windows.Interop.D3DImage.SetBackBuffer%2A>método.</xref:System.Windows.Interop.D3DImage.SetBackBuffer%2A>

trans-unit.source: The width of the <xref href="System.Windows.Interop.D3DImage"></xref>, in pixels.
trans-unit.target: A largura do <xref href="System.Windows.Interop.D3DImage"> </xref>, em pixels.

trans-unit.source: Assigns a Direct3D surface as the source of the back buffer.
trans-unit.target: Atribui uma superfície Direct3D como a origem do buffer de fundo.

trans-unit.source: Call the SetBackBuffer method to assign a Direct3D surface to the back buffer.
trans-unit.target: Chame o método SetBackBuffer para atribuir uma superfície Direct3D para o buffer de fundo.

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > Performance depends greatly on the settings of the Direct3D surface.
trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE] > Desempenho depende muito das configurações da superfície Direct3D.

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [Performance Considerations for Direct3D9 and WPF Interoperability](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: Para obter mais informações, consulte [considerações sobre desempenho de Direct3D9 e interoperabilidade do WPF](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).

trans-unit.source: Calling the SetBackBuffer overload is identical to calling the <xref:System.Windows.Interop.D3DImage.SetBackBuffer%28System.Windows.Interop.D3DResourceType%2CSystem.IntPtr%2CSystem.Boolean%29> overload with the `enableSoftwareFallback` parameter set to `false`.
trans-unit.target: Chamar a sobrecarga de SetBackBuffer é idêntico ao chamar o <xref:System.Windows.Interop.D3DImage.SetBackBuffer%28System.Windows.Interop.D3DResourceType%2CSystem.IntPtr%2CSystem.Boolean%29>sobrecarga com a `enableSoftwareFallback` parâmetro definido como `false`.</xref:System.Windows.Interop.D3DImage.SetBackBuffer%28System.Windows.Interop.D3DResourceType%2CSystem.IntPtr%2CSystem.Boolean%29>

trans-unit.source: When you call SetBackBuffer or call <xref:System.Windows.Interop.D3DImage.SetBackBuffer%28System.Windows.Interop.D3DResourceType%2CSystem.IntPtr%2CSystem.Boolean%29> with the `enableSoftwareFallback` parameter set to `false`, the rendering system releases its reference to the back buffer when front buffer becomes unavailable and nothing is displayed.
trans-unit.target: Quando você chama SetBackBuffer ou chamada <xref:System.Windows.Interop.D3DImage.SetBackBuffer%28System.Windows.Interop.D3DResourceType%2CSystem.IntPtr%2CSystem.Boolean%29>com o `enableSoftwareFallback` parâmetro definido como `false`, o sistema de processamento libera sua referência para o buffer de fundo quando o buffer frontal ficará indisponível e nada é exibido.</xref:System.Windows.Interop.D3DImage.SetBackBuffer%28System.Windows.Interop.D3DResourceType%2CSystem.IntPtr%2CSystem.Boolean%29>

trans-unit.source: When the front buffer is available again, the rendering system raises the <xref:System.Windows.Interop.D3DImage.IsFrontBufferAvailableChanged> event to notify your WPF application.
trans-unit.target: Quando o buffer frontal está disponível novamente, o sistema de processamento gera o <xref:System.Windows.Interop.D3DImage.IsFrontBufferAvailableChanged>evento para notificar o aplicativo do WPF.</xref:System.Windows.Interop.D3DImage.IsFrontBufferAvailableChanged>

trans-unit.source: You can create an event handler for the <xref:System.Windows.Interop.D3DImage.IsFrontBufferAvailableChanged> event to restart rendering again with a valid Direct3D surface.
trans-unit.target: Você pode criar um manipulador de eventos para o <xref:System.Windows.Interop.D3DImage.IsFrontBufferAvailableChanged>eventos reiniciar renderização novamente com uma superfície Direct3D válida.</xref:System.Windows.Interop.D3DImage.IsFrontBufferAvailableChanged>

trans-unit.source: To restart rendering, you must call SetBackBuffer.
trans-unit.target: Para reiniciar o processamento, você deve chamar SetBackBuffer.

trans-unit.source: The following list shows the required back buffer settings for the `IDirect3DSurface9` type.
trans-unit.target: A lista a seguir mostra as configurações do buffer de fundo necessária para o `IDirect3DSurface9` tipo.

trans-unit.source: - `D3DFMT_A8R8G8B8` or `D3DFMT_X8R8G8B8` - `D3DUSAGE_RENDERTARGET` - `D3DPOOL_DEFAULT` Multisampling is allowed on `IDirect3DSurface9Ex` surfaces only.
trans-unit.target: - `D3DFMT_A8R8G8B8` ou `D3DFMT_X8R8G8B8` - `D3DUSAGE_RENDERTARGET` - `D3DPOOL_DEFAULT` multi-amostras é permitida em `IDirect3DSurface9Ex` superfícies apenas.

trans-unit.source: The type of Direct3D surface.
trans-unit.target: O tipo da superfície do Direct3D.

trans-unit.source: Must be a valid <xref href="System.Windows.Interop.D3DResourceType"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Deve ser um válido <xref href="System.Windows.Interop.D3DResourceType"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: The Direct3D surface to assign as the back buffer.
trans-unit.target: A superfície do Direct3D para atribuir como o buffer de fundo.

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Windows.Interop.D3DImage"></xref> has not been locked by a call to the <xref:System.Windows.Interop.D3DImage.Lock*> or <xref:System.Windows.Interop.D3DImage.TryLock*> methods.
trans-unit.target: O <xref href="System.Windows.Interop.D3DImage"> </xref> não foi bloqueado por uma chamada para o <> </> *> ou <> </> *> métodos.

trans-unit.source: backBufferType is not a valid .
trans-unit.target: backBufferTypenão é válido .

trans-unit.source: The creation parameters for backBuffer do not meet the requirements for the backBufferType-or-The backBuffer device is not valid.
trans-unit.target: Os parâmetros de criação para backBuffer não atende aos requisitos para o backBufferType - ou -o backBuffer dispositivo não é válido.

trans-unit.source: Assigns a Direct3D surface as the source of the back buffer.
trans-unit.target: Atribui uma superfície Direct3D como a origem do buffer de fundo.

trans-unit.source: When you call the <xref:System.Windows.Interop.D3DImage.SetBackBuffer%28System.Windows.Interop.D3DResourceType%2CSystem.IntPtr%29> overload or call the SetBackBuffer overload with the `enableSoftwareFallback` parameter set to `false`, the rendering system releases its reference to the back buffer when the front buffer becomes unavailable and nothing is displayed.
trans-unit.target: Quando você chama o <xref:System.Windows.Interop.D3DImage.SetBackBuffer%28System.Windows.Interop.D3DResourceType%2CSystem.IntPtr%29>sobrecarga ou chamar a sobrecarga de SetBackBuffer com o `enableSoftwareFallback` parâmetro definido como `false`, o sistema de processamento libera sua referência para o buffer de fundo quando o buffer principal fica indisponível, e nada é exibido.</xref:System.Windows.Interop.D3DImage.SetBackBuffer%28System.Windows.Interop.D3DResourceType%2CSystem.IntPtr%29>

trans-unit.source: When the front buffer is available again, the rendering system raises the <xref:System.Windows.Interop.D3DImage.IsFrontBufferAvailableChanged> event to notify your WPF application.
trans-unit.target: Quando o buffer frontal está disponível novamente, o sistema de processamento gera o <xref:System.Windows.Interop.D3DImage.IsFrontBufferAvailableChanged>evento para notificar o aplicativo do WPF.</xref:System.Windows.Interop.D3DImage.IsFrontBufferAvailableChanged>

trans-unit.source: You can create an event handler for the <xref:System.Windows.Interop.D3DImage.IsFrontBufferAvailableChanged> event to restart rendering again with a valid Direct3D surface.
trans-unit.target: Você pode criar um manipulador de eventos para o <xref:System.Windows.Interop.D3DImage.IsFrontBufferAvailableChanged>eventos reiniciar renderização novamente com uma superfície Direct3D válida.</xref:System.Windows.Interop.D3DImage.IsFrontBufferAvailableChanged>

trans-unit.source: To restart rendering, you must call <xref:System.Windows.Interop.D3DImage.SetBackBuffer%2A>.
trans-unit.target: Para reiniciar o processamento, você deve chamar <xref:System.Windows.Interop.D3DImage.SetBackBuffer%2A>.</xref:System.Windows.Interop.D3DImage.SetBackBuffer%2A>

trans-unit.source: When you call SetBackBuffer with the `enableSoftwareFallback` parameter set to `true`, the rendering system retains its reference to the back buffer when the front buffer becomes unavailable, so there is no need to call <xref:System.Windows.Interop.D3DImage.SetBackBuffer%2A> when the front buffer is available again.
trans-unit.target: Quando você chama SetBackBuffer com o `enableSoftwareFallback` parâmetro definido como `true`, o sistema de processamento retém sua referência para o buffer de fundo quando o buffer principal fica indisponível, portanto, não há necessidade de chamar <xref:System.Windows.Interop.D3DImage.SetBackBuffer%2A>quando o buffer frontal está disponível novamente.</xref:System.Windows.Interop.D3DImage.SetBackBuffer%2A>

trans-unit.source: There may be situations where the user’s device becomes unavailable.
trans-unit.target: Pode haver situações em que o dispositivo do usuário se torna indisponível.

trans-unit.source: When that occurs, call <xref:System.Windows.Interop.D3DImage.SetBackBuffer%2A> to release WPF’s reference to the back buffer.
trans-unit.target: Quando isso ocorrer, chame <xref:System.Windows.Interop.D3DImage.SetBackBuffer%2A>para liberar a referência do WPF para o buffer de fundo.</xref:System.Windows.Interop.D3DImage.SetBackBuffer%2A>

trans-unit.source: If you need to reset your device, call <xref:System.Windows.Interop.D3DImage.SetBackBuffer%2A> with `backBuffer` set to `null`, and then call <xref:System.Windows.Interop.D3DImage.SetBackBuffer%2A> again with `backBuffer` set to a valid Direct3D surface.
trans-unit.target: Se você precisar redefinir o dispositivo, chame <xref:System.Windows.Interop.D3DImage.SetBackBuffer%2A>com `backBuffer` definida como `null`e, em seguida, chame <xref:System.Windows.Interop.D3DImage.SetBackBuffer%2A>novamente com `backBuffer` definido como uma superfície Direct3D válida.</xref:System.Windows.Interop.D3DImage.SetBackBuffer%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Interop.D3DImage.SetBackBuffer%2A>

trans-unit.source: The following list shows the required back buffer settings for the `IDirect3DSurface9` type.
trans-unit.target: A lista a seguir mostra as configurações do buffer de fundo necessária para o `IDirect3DSurface9` tipo.

trans-unit.source: - `D3DFMT_A8R8G8B8` or `D3DFMT_X8R8G8B8` - `D3DUSAGE_RENDERTARGET` - `D3DPOOL_DEFAULT` Multisampling is allowed on `IDirect3DSurface9Ex` surfaces only.
trans-unit.target: - `D3DFMT_A8R8G8B8` ou `D3DFMT_X8R8G8B8` - `D3DUSAGE_RENDERTARGET` - `D3DPOOL_DEFAULT` multi-amostras é permitida em `IDirect3DSurface9Ex` superfícies apenas.

trans-unit.source: The type of Direct3D surface.
trans-unit.target: O tipo da superfície do Direct3D.

trans-unit.source: Must be a valid <xref href="System.Windows.Interop.D3DResourceType"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Deve ser um válido <xref href="System.Windows.Interop.D3DResourceType"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: The Direct3D surface to assign as the back buffer.
trans-unit.target: A superfície do Direct3D para atribuir como o buffer de fundo.

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> to fall back on software rendering; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>para retornar a renderização por software; Caso contrário, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Attempts to lock the <xref href="System.Windows.Interop.D3DImage"></xref> and waits for the specified duration.
trans-unit.target: Tenta bloquear o <xref href="System.Windows.Interop.D3DImage"> </xref> e aguarda a duração especificada.

trans-unit.source: The duration to wait for the lock to be acquired.
trans-unit.target: A duração de espera para o aquisição do bloqueio.

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the lock was acquired; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Se o bloqueio foi adquirido; Caso contrário, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: timeout is set to .
trans-unit.target: timeouté definido como .

trans-unit.source: The lock count equals <xref:System.UInt32.MaxValue>.
trans-unit.target: A contagem de bloqueio é igual a <xref:System.UInt32.MaxValue>.</xref:System.UInt32.MaxValue>

trans-unit.source: Decrements the lock count for the <xref href="System.Windows.Interop.D3DImage"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Diminui a contagem de bloqueio para o <xref href="System.Windows.Interop.D3DImage"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: When the lock count for the <xref:System.Windows.Interop.D3DImage> reaches zero, the <xref:System.Windows.Interop.D3DImage> is fully unlocked.
trans-unit.target: Quando a contagem de bloqueio para o <xref:System.Windows.Interop.D3DImage>chegar a zero, o <xref:System.Windows.Interop.D3DImage>está totalmente desbloqueado.</xref:System.Windows.Interop.D3DImage> </xref:System.Windows.Interop.D3DImage>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Interop.D3DImage> is marked for rendering if the image has changed areas that were specified by previous calls to the <xref:System.Windows.Interop.D3DImage.AddDirtyRect%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Windows.Interop.D3DImage>está marcado para renderização se a imagem tiver sido alterada áreas que foram especificadas por chamadas anteriores para o <xref:System.Windows.Interop.D3DImage.AddDirtyRect%2A>método.</xref:System.Windows.Interop.D3DImage.AddDirtyRect%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Interop.D3DImage>

trans-unit.source: When the changes are committed and rendering occurs, additional calls to the <xref:System.Windows.Interop.D3DImage.Lock%2A> method block until the render thread has copied the contents of the back buffer to the front buffer.
trans-unit.target: Quando as alterações são confirmadas e processamento ocorre, chamadas adicionais para o <xref:System.Windows.Interop.D3DImage.Lock%2A>Bloco de métodos até que o thread de processamento copiou o conteúdo do buffer de fundo no buffer frontal.</xref:System.Windows.Interop.D3DImage.Lock%2A>

trans-unit.source: This synchronization avoids display artifacts, such as tearing.
trans-unit.target: Essa sincronização evita artefatos de exibição, como divisão.

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > Do not update the Direct3D surface while the <xref:System.Windows.Interop.D3DImage> is unlocked.
trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE] > Não atualizar a superfície do Direct3D enquanto o <xref:System.Windows.Interop.D3DImage>está desbloqueado.</xref:System.Windows.Interop.D3DImage>

trans-unit.source: Gets the width of the <xref href="System.Windows.Interop.D3DImage"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Obtém a largura do <xref href="System.Windows.Interop.D3DImage"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: The value of Width can change when a new back buffer is assigned by a call to the <xref:System.Windows.Interop.D3DImage.SetBackBuffer%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: O valor de largura pode mudar quando um novo buffer de fundo é atribuído por uma chamada para o <xref:System.Windows.Interop.D3DImage.SetBackBuffer%2A>método.</xref:System.Windows.Interop.D3DImage.SetBackBuffer%2A>

trans-unit.source: The width of the <xref href="System.Windows.Interop.D3DImage"></xref>, in measure units.
trans-unit.target: A largura do <xref href="System.Windows.Interop.D3DImage"> </xref>, em unidades de medida.

trans-unit.source: A measure unit is 1/96th inch.
trans-unit.target: Uma unidade de medida é 1/96 polegada.
